name: IIITNR-APP
description: Developed an app using Flutter and Dart, facilitating event registration and form submissions for IIIT-NR students. Integrated Firebase for real-time database management, user authentication, and cloud storage for secure data handling.

name: Study-Simplify
description: An educational platform using Python and Flask for backend development, integrating Assembly AI for text extraction and summarization from various media formats.

name: Crossword Puzzle Generator
description: Developed an AI algorithm using Constraint Satisfaction Problem (CSP) to generate ready-to-play crossword puzzles, deployed on a Flask-based interactive website.

name: RFID-based Home Security System
description: Created a RFID-based home security system supporting RFID tags and OTPs as door keys with an inbuilt alarm system, built for RaspberryPi.
